function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of mobile device location data for data collection may raise privacy concerns.","Impact":"Potential violation of privacy rights and data security issues.","Mitigation":"Anonymize or aggregate data to protect individual privacy, and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, data encryption, and data protection protocols.","People":"Individuals whose location data is being collected, data protection authorities, legal experts.","Owner":"Data collection organizations, data protection officers, legal teams."},{"Description":"Bias in data collection due to lower percentage of people with cell phones in poor areas.","Impact":"Underestimation of mobility in poor areas, leading to inaccurate data analysis and policy decisions.","Mitigation":"Use statistical methods to account for bias, and validate findings with on-the-ground observations in poor areas.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, validation techniques, on-the-ground surveys.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, policymakers, residents of poor areas.","Owner":"Data analysis teams, research organizations, policymakers."},{"Description":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases due to mobility patterns and visitation to parks.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and spread of contagious diseases, potentially leading to public health crises.","Mitigation":"Implement measures for social distancing, sanitation, and monitoring of park visitation, and promote public health education and awareness.","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for monitoring, contact tracing apps, sanitation equipment, public health communication platforms.","People":"Park visitors, local residents, public health authorities, policymakers.","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities, park management organizations."}]}
